title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), hereby make the following
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 

(Application to specified diseases) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited animal health welfare act 2013 (application specified diseases) order 2020

title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), hereby make the following
heading: 2. The provisions of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 apply to
text_raw:
2. The provisions of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 apply to 

each disease specified in the Schedule.
text_norm: 2 provision animal health welfare act 2013 apply disease specified schedule

title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), hereby make the following
heading: 3. The following are revoked:
text_raw:
3. The following are revoked: 

(a) 

(b) 

the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 (Application to 
tuberculosis) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 109 of 2014), and 

the Animal Health and Welfare Act (Application of Act to 
Disease) Order 2018 (S.I. No. 135 of 2018). 

Schedule
text_norm: 3 following revoked (a) (b) animal health welfare act 2013 (application tuberculosis) order 2014 (s.i no 109 2014) animal health welfare act (application act disease) order 2018 (s.i no 135 2018) schedule

title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), hereby make the following
heading: 1. Batrachchytrium salamandrivorans (BSa1).

title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), hereby make the following
heading: 2. Bovine genital campylobacteriosis.

title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), hereby make the following
heading: 3. Foot pad dermatitis in poultry.

title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), hereby make the following
heading: 4. Heartwater.

title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), hereby make the following
heading: 5. Leishmaniasis.

title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), hereby make the following
heading: 6. Tuberculosis in animals other than ruminants.
text_raw: 6. Tuberculosis in animals other than ruminants.

title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), hereby make the following
heading: 7. All diseases that may be transmitted to an animal from a human or to a
text_raw:
7. All diseases that may be transmitted to an animal from a human or to a 
human from an animal, other than a zoonotic disease referred to in 
Schedule 3 to the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013, or otherwise 
referred to in this Schedule. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

5 November, 2020. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th November, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [516] 3

title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), hereby make the following
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

The effect of this Order is to make the diseases listed in the Schedule diseases 
to which the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 applies. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [516]
